description:
YouTube has announced that "thousands of YouTube users make over $100,000 every year" (almost $2,000 dollars a week!).

What if you could join those thousands of people earning on YouTube with less than part-time work?

How about working just an hour a day from your home?

In this course I will show you a mind-blowingly simple method that could earn you money month after month by uploading simple-to-make videos that tens of millions of people are actively looking for.

Best of all, you don't need to use a microphone or a camera, or even be creative!

The YouTube niche presented here is one of the fastest growing niches out there and it is so new it is almost untouched, making dominating search results very easy. Add to this that ever so often a new sub-niche is opening up and millions of new people are flocking to YouTube for this content every year and you have hit jackpot!

Here is a simple analogy: imagine being able to record and upload the best games from the soccer World cup or Superbowl for tens of millions of content hungry sports fans without any copyright issues.

What if I told you something very, very similar is possible?

Simply hit the "record" button, wait for the content to end, stop recording, upload to YouTube, repeat several times a day and profit.

Yes, it's that simple!

My intention was to lay this out as short and clear as possible and, more importantly, demonstrate it on a real life example so literally anyone can take the idea and knowledge gained and start the same second after finishing the course.

No financial investment is needed, on the contrary, I advise against it!

Absolutely no prior experience or knowledge needed with YouTube, recording or anything involved in this method!

With all of that said, you do need three things:

- an hour to watch this course (can't make it shorter than this, sorry!)

- 60 minutes of consistent (but very simple!) work a day

- access to a good enough computer with a 4 year old or newer nVidia or ATI/AMD dedicated graphics card, or Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better for integrated graphics

I am determined to help my students succeed - you will be able to ask for guidance and advice and all the future extra lectures are free.

If you still harbor that bit of a doubt, you are completely covered with the uconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - there is no way to lose money with this - in the course I actually say several times not to spend any money!

See you on the other side :-)
title: Work From Home - YouTube Gaming Channel Home Business
